last_episode_to_air.name: We Shouldn't Exist
last_episode_to_air.overview: While Molly and the Wells Foundation are on the precipice of their greatest success, the team faces big personal decisions.

name: Loot
overview: After divorcing her husband of 20 years, Molly Novak must figure out what to do with her $87 billion settlement. She decides to reengage with her charitable foundation and reconnect with the real worldâ€”finding herself along the way.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: A year after Molly Wells settled her very public divorce from tech billionaire John Novak, we find her thriving in her role as the head of her philanthropic organization, the Wells Foundation. Focused mainly on her charity work, Molly has sworn off any new relationships with men.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Molly Novak's life is thrown into upheaval when she discovers her billionaire husband is cheating on her.

episodes.name: Bienvenidos a Miami
episodes.overview: On her first day of work at The Wells Foundation, Molly tries to fit in with Sofia and the rest of the team.

episodes.name: Hot Seat
episodes.overview: When John gives an interview questioning her substance, Molly and her co-workers decide to hit back. Howard makes a discovery about Nicholas.

episodes.name: Excitement Park
episodes.overview: Arthur helps Molly sort through her financial portfolio after she realizes she owns several problematic companies.

episodes.name: Halsa
episodes.overview: Molly takes some of her co-workers on a high-end spa day. Arthur seeks relationship advice from Nicholas and Howard.

episodes.name: The Philanthropic Humanitarian Awards
episodes.overview: The Wells Foundation team attends a ceremony where Molly is receiving an award for her charity work.

episodes.name: French Connection
episodes.overview: Molly travels to Jean-Pierre's vineyard for a date...or is it? Howard wants Nicholas to meet his girlfriend, Tanya.

episodes.name: Spades Night
episodes.overview: Molly asks Howard to help repair her relationship with their family. Sofia has an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Cahoga Lake
episodes.overview: The Wells Foundation team receives exciting news from both Molly and Sofia. Nicholas gets a new opportunity.

episodes.name: The Silver Moon Summit
episodes.overview: At the Silver Moon Summit in Corsica, Molly must make a choice between her past and her future.

episodes.name: Space for Everyone
episodes.overview: Molly and the Wells Foundation team struggle to live up to her promise to donate the entirety of her vast fortune. Arthur has a new lease on life.

episodes.name: Clueless
episodes.overview: As Molly moves forward with the Space for Everyone project, Sofia butts heads with its architect. Howard asks Arthur for financial advice.

episodes.name: Vengeance Falls
episodes.overview: When Nicholas' new play premieres, Molly brings some surprise visitors. Howard suspects Sofia is hiding a secret.

episodes.name: Mr. Congeniality
episodes.overview: Molly attends a meditation retreat. Howard and Arthur audition wrestlers for their new league. Ainsley asks Sofia and Nicholas for wedding help.

episodes.name: Mally's
episodes.overview: Arthur and Molly try to sell her megayacht to a Swedish billionaire. Sofia and rest of the team hit the streets to collect signatures.

episodes.name: Women Who Rule
episodes.overview: It's LA Fashion Weekâ€”and Molly is asked to walk the runway. Sofia faces commitment issues with Isaac. Arthur asks Howard for style advice.

episodes.name: Camp Wells
episodes.overview: Molly and Nicholas plan a work retreat for the Wells Foundation crew. Sofia and Howard struggle with the outdoors.

episodes.name: Grace
episodes.overview: Sofia and Molly try to recruit another billionaire for their cause. Nicholas needs Howard's help to prepare for a difficult audition.

episodes.name: Mood Vibrations
episodes.overview: As Space For Everyone becomes a reality, Molly's ex-husband tries to steal the spotlight. Sofia struggles to balance work and her relationship.

episodes.name: We Shouldn't Exist
episodes.overview: While Molly and the Wells Foundation are on the precipice of their greatest success, the team faces big personal decisions.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: A year after Molly Wells settled her very public divorce from tech billionaire John Novak, we find her thriving in her role as the head of her philanthropic organization, the Wells Foundation. Focused mainly on her charity work, Molly has sworn off any new relationships with men.
